Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Enacts the Effective Enforcement of Civil Rights Act of 2022
Summary: Enacts the "Effective Enforcement of Civil Rights Act of 2022", providing for the enactment and enforcement of local human rights laws.
LawCode: Amd §§292 & 295, Exec L; amd Art 12-D §§239-o - 239-t, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the general municipal law, in relation to providing for local human rights laws
